sentences.english: The resolution and toughness shown in him was valuable.
sentences.chinese: 那表現出的那種堅毅，剛強，是難人可貴的。

sentences.english: We have a character of fortitude, a spirit of never being defeated, and a confidence of certain triumph.
sentences.chinese: 我們有着堅毅的性格，永不言敗的精神和必勝的信心。

sentences.english: You might be a little bit slow-witted, but your consistency will make it up.
sentences.chinese: 你也許反應有點慢，但是你的堅毅會彌補這個缺點。

sentences.english: McCain had his fortitude forged by fire in a prison camp; he throbs with an energy of someone who has never stopped making up for lost time.
sentences.chinese: 麥凱恩有一種在牢獄中淬鍊出的堅毅。

sentences.english: These rays reveal God's uncompromising devotion to life.
sentences.chinese: 這些暖流令我們看見神堅毅不屈地熱愛生命。
一副寬闊，標準，堅毅的女人面孔。

sentences.english: Under that tree, the statue, twisting his fortitude handsome face, a wriggler.
sentences.chinese: 看老樹下，那雕像，緊蹙雙眉堅毅天庭俊朗。

sentences.english: Fortified positions, heavy weapons, communication facilities are the key targets.
sentences.chinese: 堅毅陣天，重兵器，通信裝笨嗲尾要方針。

sentences.english: Both xuan zang persistence westbound footprint, more have the marks of the ancient silk road.
sentences.chinese: 既有玄奘堅毅西行的足跡，更有古絲綢之路的印記。

sentences.english: Firm and steadly, guietly works hard, makes the drip contribution for the society.
sentences.chinese: 堅毅踏實，埋頭苦幹，爲社會作出點滴貢獻。

sentences.english: Six Shis thousand facial expression determination the floor looking at this curious ball.
sentences.chinese: 陸蒔千神情堅毅地看着這怪球。

sentences.english: Never give up even after falling.
sentences.chinese: 堅毅望着前路，跌倒也不應放棄。

sentences.english: Victory belongs to the most persevering. ----Napolen.
sentences.chinese: 勝利屬於那些最堅毅不拔的人。

sentences.english: A bhikkhu with a resolute mind.
sentences.chinese: 對一個有堅毅心的比丘。

sentences.english: I was taught to be really hard and push through.
sentences.chinese: 我只學到了要非常堅毅，咬咬牙挺過去。
李順信將軍的性格堅毅。
